meta.name: Bug Brief Generator
meta.description: Turns raw bug text into a ready-to-file bug brief with repro, scope, and impact.

data.label: Structure Report
data.prompt: Turn the input into a structured bug report outline: Title, Summary, Observed, Expected, Suspected scope, Impacted users, Attachments needed.

data.label: Repro Steps
data.prompt: Draft concise reproduction steps (max 8). Include environment assumptions and data setup if relevant.

data.label: Final Bug Brief
data.prompt: Produce a ready-to-file bug brief with sections: Summary, Repro Steps, Expected vs Observed, Impact, Suspected Scope, Evidence Needed.
